casebody.data:
TEAGUE
v.
DOT. No. 281P06-3. Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 3, 2007. Tina Krasner, Assistant Attorney General, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 22nd day of January 2007 by Petitioner for Declaratory Judgment on five separate and distinct alternative NC statutes all referenced to the subject case:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference this the 3rd day of May 2007."
